name: Parking Tow
description:
Tow parking is a fun and addictive puzzle game. It’s more than just tow away a car – it’s a fun driving experience that’ll take you to another level.

Parking lots in tow truck, challenging towing situation and much more. Experience one of the best tow truck game, solve puzzles which get harder each level, choose which car to move to fill all the lots in tow truck.

In this funny and colorful game, you challenge your logic skills and critical thinking.
